text: @JoeBiden Is Covid-19 always your plot??? It's irritating that @JoeBiden and news media refuses to call this violence by it's name  'GANG VIOLENCE'. How do you expect to address an issue when you refuse to even acknowledge it. Pretending it doesn't exist isn't going to make it go away.
